bookmarksDesc: Options for hiding files in bookmarks (if the main plugin is enabled).

compatSpf.desc: {{- pluginLink}} adding a {{- datapath}} attribute to {{- treeInner}}, doubles all the rules to take it into account.
compatSpf.title: Compatibility with Simple Colored Folder plugin

contextMenuButton: Show a button in the bookmarks context menu
contextMenuButtonDesc:
Allows you to hide/show a file in bookmarks from the bookmarks menu. 
Warning, experimental feature!

excludedFiles.desc: Automatically hide the excluded files from Obsidian Settings
excludedFiles.title: Excluded files

file-menu: By default, hiding a file from Explorer will also hide its bookmark (if it exists).
snippetCSSInBg: Let the plugin use a CSS snippet instead of load directly the CSS into Obsidian.
